expo.name: Map-Action-Mobile
expo.iosUserTrackingPermission: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The app needs permission to your camera in order to take photos for upload it as like your profil picture or additional pictures
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The app needs permission to your camera roll in order to add photos you've already taken for upload it as like your profil picture or additional pictures
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This allow us to use your location for incident declaration to get the exact positon of incident and show you the incidents in your sector by your position
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This allow us to use your location for incident declaration to get the exact positon of incident and show you the incidents in your sector by your position
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This allow us to use your location for incident declaration to get the exact positon of incident and show you the incidents in your sector by your position
